title: User Registration with Valid Data
description: Verify that a new user can register successfully with valid email and password, and password is hashed using bcryptjs.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Input a valid email address and a strong password.
Submit the registration form.
Confirm that registration is successful and a new account is created.
Verify that the password is stored in hashed form (using bcryptjs) in the back-end.

title: User Login with Correct Credentials
description: Check that a registered user can log in successfully using valid email and password.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter valid email and password.
Click the login button.
Confirm successful login and redirection to user dashboard.

title: User Login with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify system rejects login attempts with invalid email or password.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter an unregistered email or incorrect password.
Click the login button.
Verify login failure message is shown and user remains on login page.

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Ensure that users only access features and data allowed by their assigned roles (Super Admin, Club Admin, Coach, Player).

steps.description: Login as each role: Super Admin, Club Admin, Coach, Player.
Attempt to access restricted admin-only endpoints and UI elements.
Confirm only authorized roles can access or perform restricted operations, others receive permission denied errors.

title: Create and Manage Club Profile
description: Check that Club Admin can create club profile with valid details, update settings, and view current profile.

steps.description: Login as Club Admin.
Navigate to Club Management page.
Enter valid club profile information and save.
Verify club profile is created successfully and data is persisted.
Update club profile details and save.
Verify profile updates are saved and correctly displayed.

title: Team Creation and Player Assignment
description: Verify Club Admin and Coaches can create teams, add players with roles, and manage rosters.

steps.description: Login as Club Admin or Coach.
Navigate to the Teams Management module.
Create a new team with a valid name and description.
Confirm team creation success and visible in team list.
Add existing players to the team with specific roles such as Captain or Member.
Confirm player roster updates correctly with assigned roles.

title: Tournament Creation and Publishing
description: Validate that Club Admins can create, edit, schedule, and publish tournaments and associated matches.

steps.description: Login as Club Admin.
Navigate to the Tournament module and start tournament creation.
Input all required tournament details and save draft.
Verify tournament saved in draft state correctly.
Schedule matches and setup brackets for the tournament.
Publish the tournament.
Confirm tournament is publicly published and accessible to appropriate users.

title: Match Result Entry and Bracket Updates
description: Ensure Coaches can enter match results correctly and bracket progression updates automatically.

steps.description: Login as Coach.
Access scheduled matches for assigned teams.
Enter valid match results (scores, winners).
Validate that match results are saved and displayed.
Verify that tournament brackets update automatically to reflect match outcomes.

title: Financial Transaction Creation and Categorization
description: Verify Club Admin can create income/expense transactions, categorize them, add notes and attachments.

steps.description: Login as Club Admin.
Navigate to the Financial Management module.
Create a new income transaction with category, notes, and upload at least one attachment.
Confirm transaction saved with correct details and attachment is accessible.
Similarly create an expense transaction.
Verify transactions appear correctly in the ledger and summary views.

title: Viewing and Exporting Analytics Dashboards
description: Ensure users can view updated social and platform analytics in dashboards and export data in CSV and JSON formats.

steps.description: Login as any authorized user.
Navigate to the Analytics Dashboard.
Verify that the dashboard displays real-time social and platform metrics accurately.
Use export options to download the displayed data as CSV and JSON files.
Confirm exported files contain correct and complete data.

title: Firestore Security Rules Validation
description: Verify Firestore security rules enforce role-based access and data restrictions according to GDPR and platform policies.

steps.description: Attempt to read and write Firestore data directly using client SDK with different roles.
Check read/write operations succeed only when authorized; unauthorized attempts are blocked.
Confirm access rules comply with GDPR data handling requirements.

title: Session Management and Logout Functionality
description: Test that users can log out and their session terminates preventing further authenticated requests.

steps.description: Login successfully.
Click logout button or invoke logout API.
Verify session is invalidated and user is redirected to login page.
Attempt to access a protected endpoint with old session token.
Confirm access is denied due to session termination.

title: API Performance Testing Under Load
description: Ensure key API endpoints respond within 300ms p95 under simulated load conditions.

steps.description: Simulate concurrent requests to core endpoints: authentication, club/team CRUD, tournaments, financials.
Measure response times and verify 95th percentile latency is under 300ms.

title: Uptime and Error Logging Verification
description: Confirm system uptime meets 99.9% monthly and error reports and audit logs are properly generated and accessible.

steps.description: Check system uptime monitoring tools and logs for the past month.
Validate uptime is equal or above 99.9%.
Trigger errors by making invalid API calls.
Confirm error logs are recorded and accessible via debug/admin tools.
Verify audit logs capture user actions accurately.

title: Data Consistency During Tournament Modifications
description: Ensure that updates to tournaments, match schedules, and results maintain consistent state and integrity.

steps.description: Create a tournament and schedule matches.
Edit tournament details and reschedule matches.
Validate updates are reflected immediately and consistent across related records.
Enter match results and observe bracket updates.
Verify no mismatched data or orphaned bracket entries exist.

title: Player Profile Management and History Viewing
description: Verify players can update their profiles and view participation schedules, tournament results, and financial transaction history.

steps.description: Login as Player.
Navigate to Profile and update personal details.
Confirm profile changes are saved.
View participation schedules, tournament results, and transaction summaries.
Verify the data displayed is accurate and complete.
